text: "The Conversation" is a 1983 song by country artists Hank Williams Jr. and Waylon Jennings. It was taken from the 1983 album Waylon and Company. It went to number 15 on the Billboard Hot Country songs chart and number 12 on the Canadian RPM Country Tracks chart. ==Notes== Category:1983 songs Category:Waylon Jennings songs Category:Hank Williams Jr. songs
title: The Conversation (Waylon Jennings and Hank Williams Jr. song)
